original_text: But when the assembly is to be gathered together, you shall blow a long blast, but you shall not sound an alarm.
korean_text: 또 회중을 모을 때에도 나팔을 불 것이나 소리를 크게 내지 말며

sentences.original_text: But when the assembly is to be gathered together
you shall blow a long blast
but you shall not sound an alarm
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 경고 소리를 내지 말라
